item.description:
This event will feature my favorite game, Dominion.

If you already know and love this game, I encourage you to attend. If you've never played and would like to try it (it's really fun and not hard to learn), please join us as well!

I've got the Dominion basic set and these expansions: Dominion Intrigue and Dominion Prosperity. Please let me know if you'll be bringing a copy of Dominion and any expansion sets, and I'll increase the attendee limit as needed.

I'm up for playing until 12:30ish and then I'll start to clean stuff up/put chairs away.

---

Snacks:

I'll have some beverages available. Please feel free to bring snacks.

---

About the location:

We will be playing in the community room of the Essex building.

Please meet at the front door of The Essex condo (11 Church St, Salem - across from what some folks call "the Almy's parking lot" - you'll see the green awning) and then I will take everyone downstairs to the Essex Room. Those who arrive later will need to call me to get in (978-219-9292). My number/directions will be posted on the front door.

If you park in the garage I can sell you a validation sticker that gives you free parking.

Â

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Dominion Night in Salem
